attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position on the map to which the control will be added. Valid values are 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', and 'bottom-right'. Defaults to 'bottom-right'.

attributes.name: compact
attributes.description: If true, the attribution control will always collapse when moving the map. If false, force the expanded attribution control. The default is a responsive attribution that collapses when the user moves the map on maps less than 640 pixels wide. Attribution should not be collapsed if it can comfortably fit on the map. compact should only be used to modify default attribution when map size makes it impossible to fit default attribution and when the automatic compact resizing for default settings are not sufficient.

attributes.name: customAttribution
attributes.description: Attributions to show in addition to any other attributions.

attributes.name: layerId
attributes.description: The id of the layer

attributes.name: metadata
attributes.description: Arbitrary properties useful to track with the layer, but do not influence rendering. Properties should be prefixed to avoid collisions, like 'maplibre:'.

attributes.name: minzoom
attributes.description: The minimum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels less than the minzoom, the layer will be hidden.

attributes.name: maxzoom
attributes.description: The maximum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels equal to or greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.

attributes.name: before
attributes.description: The ID of an existing layer to insert the new layer before, resulting in the new layer appearing visually beneath the existing layer. If this argument is not specified, the layer will be appended to the end of the layers array and appear visually above all other layers.

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description:
Layout properties for the layer.
See https://maplibre.org/maplibre-style-spec/layers/#background

attributes.name: paint
attributes.description:
Default paint properties for this layer.
See https://maplibre.org/maplibre-style-spec/layers/#background

tags.name: MglCustomControl
tags.description: Render a custom control with your content in the default slot

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position on the map to which the control will be added. Valid values are 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', and 'bottom-right'. Defaults to 'top-left'.

attributes.name: class
attributes.description: Set the classes on the control div

slots.name: default
slots.description: Slot to render the content of the control

tags.name: MglFillExtrusionLayer
tags.description:
Fill Extrusion Layer

See the [layer style specification](https://maplibre.org/maplibre-style-spec/layers/)

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position on the map to which the control will be added. Valid values are 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', and 'bottom-right'. Defaults to 'top-right'.

attributes.name: container
attributes.description: container is the compatible DOM element which should be made full screen. By default, the map container element will be made full screen.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position on the map to which the control will be added. Valid values are 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', and 'bottom-right'. Defaults to 'top-right'.

attributes.name: positionOptions
attributes.description: A Geolocation API [PositionOptions](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/PositionOptions) object.

attributes.name: fitBoundsOptions
attributes.description: A options object to use when the map is panned and zoomed to the user's location. The default is to use a maxZoom of 15 to limit how far the map will zoom in for very accurate locations.

attributes.name: trackUserLocation
attributes.description: If true the GeolocateControl becomes a toggle button and when active the map will receive updates to the user's location as it changes.

attributes.name: showAccuracyCircle
attributes.description: By default, if showUserLocation is true, a transparent circle will be drawn around the user location indicating the accuracy (95% confidence level) of the user's location. Set to false to disable. Always disabled when showUserLocation is false.

attributes.name: showUserLocation
attributes.description: By default a dot will be shown on the map at the user's location. Set to false to disable.

tags.name: MglHillshadeLayer
tags.description:
Hill shade Layer

See the [layer style specification](https://maplibre.org/maplibre-style-spec/layers/)

tags.name: MglImage
tags.description:
Load an image to maplibre to use in the style.
If the image id already exist, nothing is done.

See [#addImage](https://maplibre.org/maplibre-gl-js/docs/API/classes/Map/#addimage) and [#loadImage](https://maplibre.org/maplibre-gl-js/docs/API/classes/Map/#loadimage)

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Image id

attributes.name: image
attributes.description:
The image data to add
The image as an HTMLImageElement, ImageData, ImageBitmap or object with width, height, and data properties with the same format as ImageData.
Required if the url props is not set

attributes.name: url
attributes.description:
The image url to load via map#loadImage
Required if the image props is not set

attributes.name: options
attributes.description: The options

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position on the map to which the control will be added. Valid values are 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', and 'bottom-right'. Defaults to 'bottom-left'.

attributes.name: compact
attributes.description: If true, force a compact logo. If false, force the full logo. The default is a responsive logo that collapses when the map is less than 640 pixels wide.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Width of the map container

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Height of the map container

attributes.name: attributionControl
attributes.description: If set, an AttributionControl will be added to the map with the provided options. To disable the attribution control, pass false. Note: showing the logo of MapLibre is not required for using MapLibre. Default Value ts compact: true, customAttribution: "MapLibre ...".

attributes.name: bearing
attributes.description: The initial bearing (rotation) of the map, measured in degrees counter-clockwise from north. If bearing is not specified in the constructor options, MapLibre GL JS will look for it in the map's style object. If it is not specified in the style, either, it will default to 0. Default Value `0`

attributes.name: bearingSnap
attributes.description: The threshold, measured in degrees, that determines when the map's bearing will snap to north. For example, with a bearingSnap of 7, if the user rotates the map within 7 degrees of north, the map will automatically snap to exact north. Default Value `7`

attributes.name: bounds
attributes.description: The initial bounds of the map. If bounds is specified, it overrides center and zoom constructor options.

attributes.name: boxZoom
attributes.description: If true, the "box zoom" interaction is enabled (see BoxZoomHandler). Default Value ts true

attributes.name: center
attributes.description: The initial geographical centerpoint of the map. If center is not specified in the constructor options, MapLibre GL JS will look for it in the map's style object. If it is not specified in the style, either, it will default to [0, 0] Note: MapLibre GL JS uses longitude, latitude coordinate order (as opposed to latitude, longitude) to match GeoJSON. Default Value ts [0, 0]

attributes.name: clickTolerance
attributes.description: The max number of pixels a user can shift the mouse pointer during a click for it to be considered a valid click (as opposed to a mouse drag). Default Value ts true

attributes.name: collectResourceTiming
attributes.description: If true, Resource Timing API information will be collected for requests made by GeoJSON and Vector Tile web workers (this information is normally inaccessible from the main Javascript thread). Information will be returned in a resourceTiming property of relevant data events. Default Value `false`

attributes.name: crossSourceCollisions
attributes.description: If true, symbols from multiple sources can collide with each other during collision detection. If false, collision detection is run separately for the symbols in each source. Default Value `true`

attributes.name: dragPan
attributes.description: If true, the "drag to pan" interaction is enabled. An Object value is passed as options to DragPanHandler#enable. Default Value `true`

attributes.name: dragRotate
attributes.description: If true, the "drag to rotate" interaction is enabled (see DragRotateHandler). Default Value `true`

attributes.name: doubleClickZoom
attributes.description: If true, the "double click to zoom" interaction is enabled (see DoubleClickZoomHandler). Default Value `true`

attributes.name: hash
attributes.description: If true, the map's position (zoom, center latitude, center longitude, bearing, and pitch) will be synced with the hash fragment of the page's URL. For example, http://path/to/my/page.html#2.59/39.26/53.07/-24.1/60. An additional string may optionally be provided to indicate a parameter-styled hash, e.g. http://path/to/my/page.html#map=2.59/39.26/53.07/-24.1/60&foo=bar, where foo is a custom parameter and bar is an arbitrary hash distinct from the map hash. Default Value `false`

attributes.name: fadeDuration
attributes.description: Controls the duration of the fade-in/fade-out animation for label collisions after initial map load, in milliseconds. This setting affects all symbol layers. This setting does not affect the duration of runtime styling transitions or raster tile cross-fading. Default Value `300`

attributes.name: fitBoundsOptions
attributes.description: A FitBoundsOptions options object to use only when fitting the initial bounds provided above.

attributes.name: interactive
attributes.description: If false, no mouse, touch, or keyboard listeners will be attached to the map, so it will not respond to interaction. Default Value `true`

attributes.name: keyboard
attributes.description: If true, keyboard shortcuts are enabled (see KeyboardHandler). Default Value `true`

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: A patch to apply to the default localization table for UI strings, e.g. control tooltips. The locale object maps namespaced UI string IDs to translated strings in the target language; see src/ui/default_locale.js for an example with all supported string IDs. The object may specify all UI strings (thereby adding support for a new translation) or only a subset of strings (thereby patching the default translation table). Default Value `null`

attributes.name: logoPosition
attributes.description: A string representing the position of the MapLibre wordmark on the map. Valid options are top-left,top-right, bottom-left, or bottom-right. Default Value 'bottom-left'

attributes.name: maxBounds
attributes.description: If set, the map will be constrained to the given bounds.

attributes.name: maxPitch
attributes.description: The maximum pitch of the map (0-85). Values greater than 60 degrees are experimental and may result in rendering issues. If you encounter any, please raise an issue with details in the MapLibre project. Default Value `60`

attributes.name: maxZoom
attributes.description: The maximum zoom level of the map (0-24). Default Value `22`

attributes.name: minPitch
attributes.description: The minimum pitch of the map (0-85). Values greater than 60 degrees are experimental and may result in rendering issues. If you encounter any, please raise an issue with details in the MapLibre project. Default Value `0`

attributes.name: minZoom
attributes.description: The minimum zoom level of the map (0-24). Default Value `0`

attributes.name: pitch
attributes.description: The initial pitch (tilt) of the map, measured in degrees away from the plane of the screen (0-85). If pitch is not specified in the constructor options, MapLibre GL JS will look for it in the map's style object. If it is not specified in the style, either, it will default to 0. Values greater than 60 degrees are experimental and may result in rendering issues. If you encounter any, please raise an issue with details in the MapLibre project. Default Value `0`

attributes.name: pitchWithRotate
attributes.description: If false, the map's pitch (tilt) control with "drag to rotate" interaction will be disabled. Default Value `true`

attributes.name: canvasContextAttributes
attributes.description: Set of WebGLContextAttributes that are applied to the WebGL context of the map. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLCanvasElement/getContext for more details. contextType can be set to webgl2 or webgl to force a WebGL version. Not setting it, Maplibre will do it's best to get a suitable context.

attributes.name: refreshExpiredTiles
attributes.description: If false, the map won't attempt to re-request tiles once they expire per their HTTP cacheControl/expires headers. Default Value `true`

attributes.name: mapStyle
attributes.description:
An optional string link to a URL, or an inlined JSON object containing a MapLibre Style Specification.

Documentation: https://maplibre.org/maplibre-style-spec

Example: https://demotiles.maplibre.org/style.json

attributes.name: trackResize
attributes.description:
If `true`, the map will automatically resize when the browser window resizes.
Default value true

attributes.name: transformRequest
attributes.description:
A callback run before the Map makes a request for an external URL. The callback can be used to modify the url, set headers, or set the credentials property for cross-origin requests.
Expected to return an object with a `url` property and optionally `headers` and `credentials` properties.

attributes.name: transformCameraUpdate
attributes.description:
A callback run before the map's camera is moved due to user input or animation. The callback can be used to modify the new center, zoom, pitch and bearing.
Expected to return an object containing center, zoom, pitch or bearing values to overwrite.

attributes.name: touchZoomRotate
attributes.description:
The map's TwoFingersTouchZoomRotateHandler, which allows the user to zoom or rotate the map with touch gestures.
Find more details and examples using `touchZoomRotate` in the TwoFingersTouchZoomRotateHandler section.

attributes.name: touchPitch
attributes.description:
The map's TwoFingersTouchPitchHandler, which allows the user to pitch the map with touch gestures.
Find more details and examples using `touchPitch` in the TwoFingersTouchPitchHandler section.

attributes.name: zoom
attributes.description: The initial zoom level of the map. If zoom is not specified in the constructor options, MapLibre GL JS will look for it in the map's style object. If it is not specified in the style, either, it will default to 0. Default Value `0`

attributes.name: maxTileCacheSize
attributes.description:
The maximum number of tiles stored in the tile cache for a given source. If omitted, the cache will be dynamically sized based on the current viewport which can be set using `maxTileCacheZoomLevels` constructor options.
Default value null

attributes.name: mapKey
attributes.description: The name or symbol to reference a map via useMap composable

attributes.name: pixelRatio
attributes.description: The pixel ratio. The canvas' width attribute will be container.clientWidth * pixelRatio and its height attribute will be container.clientHeight * pixelRatio. Defaults to devicePixelRatio if not specified.

attributes.name: validateStyle
attributes.description:
If false, style validation will be skipped. Useful in production environment.
Default value true

attributes.name: cooperativeGestures
attributes.description:
The map's {@link CooperativeGesturesHandler}, which allows the user to see cooperative gesture info when user tries to zoom in/out.
Find more details and examples using `cooperativeGestures` in the {@link CooperativeGesturesHandler} section.

slots.name: default
slots.description: Slot for controls, sources, marker and popup

attributes.name: coordinates
attributes.description: Marker coordinates

attributes.name: className
attributes.description: Space-separated CSS class names to add to marker container

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: The offset in pixels as a PointLike object to apply relative to the element's center. Negatives indicate left and up.

attributes.name: anchor
attributes.description: A string indicating the part of the Marker that should be positioned closest to the coordinate set via Marker#setLngLat. Options are 'center', 'top', 'bottom', 'left', 'right', 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', and 'bottom-right'. Default Value 'center'

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: The color to use for the default marker if options.element is not provided. The default is light blue. Default Value '#3FB1CE'

attributes.name: draggable
attributes.description: A boolean indicating whether or not a marker is able to be dragged to a new position on the map. Default Value false

attributes.name: clickTolerance
attributes.description: The max number of pixels a user can shift the mouse pointer during a click on the marker for it to be considered a valid click (as opposed to a marker drag). The default is to inherit map's clickTolerance. Default Value 0

attributes.name: rotation
attributes.description: The rotation angle of the marker in degrees, relative to its respective rotationAlignment setting. A positive value will rotate the marker clockwise. Default Value 0

attributes.name: rotationAlignment
attributes.description: map aligns the Marker's rotation relative to the map, maintaining a bearing as the map rotates. viewport aligns the Marker's rotation relative to the viewport, agnostic to map rotations. auto is equivalent to viewport. Default Value 'auto'

attributes.name: pitchAlignment
attributes.description: map aligns the Marker to the plane of the map. viewport aligns the Marker to the plane of the viewport. auto automatically matches the value of rotationAlignment. Default Value 'auto'

attributes.name: scale
attributes.description: The scale to use for the default marker if options.element is not provided. The default scale corresponds to a height of 41px and a width of 27px. Default Value 1

attributes.name: opacity
attributes.description: Marker's opacity when it's in clear view (not behind 3d terrain). Default value `1`

attributes.name: opacityWhenCovered
attributes.description: Marker's opacity when it's behind 3d terrain

attributes.name: subpixelPositioning
attributes.description: If true, rounding is disabled for placement of the marker, allowing for subpixel positioning and smoother movement when the marker is translated.

events.name: dragend
events.description: Fired when the marker is finished being dragged

events.name: update:coordinates
events.description: Fired when the coordinates have been updated when the marker is draggable

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position on the map to which the control will be added. Valid values are 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', and 'bottom-right'. Defaults to 'top-right'.

attributes.name: showCompass
attributes.description: If true the compass button is included.

attributes.name: showZoom
attributes.description: If true the zoom-in and zoom-out buttons are included.

attributes.name: visualizePitch
attributes.description: If true the pitch is visualized by rotating X-axis of compass.

attributes.name: coordinates
attributes.description:
The geographical location of the popup's anchor.
Unused when placed inside a marker.

attributes.name: closeButton
attributes.description: Display a close button in the top right corner.

attributes.name: closeOnClick
attributes.description: The popup will be closed when the map is clicked.

attributes.name: closeOnMove
attributes.description: The popup will be closed when the map moves.

attributes.name: focusAfterOpen
attributes.description: The popup will try to focus the first focusable element inside the popup.

attributes.name: anchor
attributes.description:
A string indicating the part of the Popup that should
be positioned closest to the coordinate.
Options are `'center'`, `'top'`, `'bottom'`, `'left'`, `'right'`, `'top-left'`,
`'top-right'`, `'bottom-left'`, and `'bottom-right'`. If unset the anchor will be
dynamically set to ensure the popup falls within the map container with a preference
for `'bottom'`.

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: A pixel offset applied to the popup's location

attributes.name: className
attributes.description: Space-separated CSS class names to add to popup container

attributes.name: maxWidth
attributes.description:
A string that sets the CSS property of the popup's maximum width, eg `'300px'`.
To ensure the popup resizes to fit its content, set this property to `'none'`.

attributes.name: subpixelPositioning
attributes.description: If true, rounding is disabled for placement of the popup, allowing for subpixel positioning and smoother movement when the popup is translated.

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Sets the popup's content to a string of text.

events.name: open
events.description: Fired when the popup is opened manually or programmatically.

events.name: close
events.description: Fired when the popup is closed manually or programmatically.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position on the map to which the control will be added. Valid values are 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', and 'bottom-right'. Defaults to 'bottom-left'.

attributes.name: maxWidth
attributes.description: The maximum length of the scale control in pixels. Default Value `100`

attributes.name: unit
attributes.description: Set the scale's unit of the distance ('imperial', 'metric' or 'nautical').
